item.description:
This is an opportunity to sample some of the services we offer as well as a chance to visit and simply chat. We will be offering Spiritual Conversations, Tarot Readings, and a special kind of body work that involves both massage and breath. Fran will also be channeling messages for you!

You can drop in any time between 2 and 6 PM. While the light refreshments and conversation are free, we do charge $10 for each ten minute session. You can pick and choose from any and 40 minutes of service is $35!

We hope to see you there!

As always, please do send any questions about your own experiences with linking with the spiritual world.

dance in the light,

Susan
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet them at the door!
item.name: Healing Afternoon
